commands.description: Attempts to relink your pawn to you. (Doesn't work for Puppeteer)
Makes your pawn insult a random viewer. If a viewer is specified, you'll insult them instead.
Makes your pawn leave the colony.
Lets you wager coins to level up a skill of your choosing.
Shows an overview of your pawn's body.
Shows information about your current RimWorld of Magic class. This command will only be usable when RimWorld of Magic is installed.
Shows an overview of your pawn's gear.
Shows an overview of your pawn's health. If a capacity is specified, it'll show what's affecting it.
Shows an overview of your pawn's needs.
Shows your pawn's relationships to other viewers.
Shows your pawn's current skills and their passions.
Shows your current stats within a given category.
